item.title: The Awesome Bogo Light
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wynilc-e2r0 Tara L. Smith, Founder/President of Peace Tree Africa, describes the advantages of the solar powered Bogo Light. She reports from the tiny North West village…
